actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that, since January 20, 2021, President Biden has implemented policies impeding domestic energy production and gas prices have steadily increased.
subjects: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

summary.text: This resolution expresses the sense of the Senate that the President's policies have impeded domestic energy production and that gas prices have steadily increased throughout his presidency.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that, since January 20, 2021, President Biden has implemented policies impeding domestic energy production and gas prices have steadily increased.
